name: PKAddSecureElementPassViewControllerDelegate
desc: The methods for responding to the life cycle events of a Secure Element pass.

items.name: func addSecureElementPassViewController(PKAddSecureElementPassViewController, didFinishAddingSecureElementPasses: [PKSecureElementPass]?, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when PassKit finishes adding one or more Secure Element passes.
